page.title: 15The Dual Carriageway
page.content: The Dual Carriageway is a very busy road .In just five minutes one hundred and six cars, fifteen lorries. fifteen vans including a mobile library, two buses and one bicycle passed the Knowles Arms car park at the end of Pleckgate Road. The road number is the A6119, a trunk road with a length of about seven and a half kilometres. It runs from the A677 near the Moat House Hotel, through Brownhill Roundabout, past St Gabriels Church and Blackburn Cemetry where it meets the A679. It is a dangerous junction near the Knowles Arms public house and there have been quite a few crashes. Coming up from Brownhill there are only two lanes but after a few hundred metres the road enlarges to four lanes. In the middle of the road in some places are grassy areas.
